subject: Re: [junit] How to test void methods
msgSnippet: Monday, February 19, 2001, 4:07:52 PM, you wrote: bs Hello everyone, bs Does any one know how to test a methos which returns bs void. For example bs public
messageBody:
Monday, February 19, 2001, 4:07:52 PM, you wrote:

bs> Hello everyone,
bs> Does any one know how to test a methos which returns
bs> void. For example
bs> public void deposit(int amount) {
bs> balance += amount;
bs> }

How about:

int balance = 17;
deposit(92)
assertEquals(109, balance);
